userStories.title: Configure agent handoffs in VS Code agents
userStories.description:
## Task
Add handoff configuration to agent files so they can transition to each other.

## Handoff Flow
- inception → breakdown (after requirements gathered)
- breakdown → ralph (after tickets created)
- ralph → (completes, signals context reset)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Handoffs defined in YAML frontmatter
- [ ] Users can transition between agents smoothly
- [ ] Context passed appropriately

## Files to Modify
All `.github/agents/*.agent.md` files
